name: Insect Shape
summary: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.
description: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures. Add the forms in insect form to your wild shape list. Whenever you use wild shape to polymorph into the non-flying insect form listed in pest form, the duration is 24 hours instead of 10 minutes.
